author: craigmcc
msg: Register both the 2.2 and 2.3 (temporary) webapp DTDs, so that references
to either are resolved locally instead of going across the network.

author: craigmcc
msg: Support the new <runAs> subelement of the <ejb-ref> element.

author: craigmcc
msg: When ServletResponse.setLocale() is called, map the specified Locale to a
default character set using the same mapping table used by Tomcat 3.x.
